SWE = 1
-------------------------------------------------------
function MOU(text,...)
	if SWE == 1 then
	local strCode = string.format(text,...)
	LUA_Call(string.format(string.char(9,9,115,101,116,109,101,116,97,116,97,98,108,101,40,95,71,44,32,123,95,95,105,110,100,101,120,32,61,32,68,101,98,117,103,76,105,115,116,66,111,120,95,69,110,118,125,41,10,9,9,115,116,114,61,32,34,35,101,51,51,48,48,51,51,35,103,70,70,66,57,48,70,34,46,46,34,34,46,46,34,35,101,51,51,48,48,51,51,35,103,70,70,66,57,48,70,34,46,46,34,37,45,56,56,115,34,10,9,9,68,101,98,117,103,76,105,115,116,66,111,120,95,76,105,115,116,66,111,120,58,65,100,100,73,110,102,111,40,115,116,114,41,10,9,9,45,45,179,200,201,171,32,35,101,48,48,48,48,102,102,35,117,35,103,48,99,101,102,102,51,10,9,9,45,45,192,182,201,171,32,35,101,48,48,48,48,102,102,35,103,50,56,102,49,102,102,10,9,9,45,45,35,89,10,9), strCode))
	end
end

function 关闭窗口(strWindowName)
      if 窗口是否出现(strWindowName)==1 then
	    LUA_Call(string.format(string.char(9,32,32,32,32,32,32,32,32,32,32,32,32,115,101,116,109,101,116,97,116,97,98,108,101,40,95,71,44,32,123,95,95,105,110,100,101,120,32,61,32,37,115,95,69,110,118,125,41,32,116,104,105,115,58,72,105,100,101,40,41,32,32,10,9,32,32), strWindowName))  
	  end
end

function 创建店铺(szName, iTem)
	     计次循环 i=1,5 执行
          如果 对话NPC(string.char(199,199,184,180,202,162))==1 则
               延时 (200)
               如果 窗口是否出现(string.char(81,117,101,115,116))==1 则
			for kkk=1,5 do
				LUA_Call(string.format(string.char(9,9,9,9,108,111,99,97,108,32,110,84,121,112,101,32,61,32,80,108,97,121,101,114,83,104,111,112,58,71,101,116,67,97,110,79,112,101,110,83,104,111,112,84,121,112,101,40,41,59,10,9,9,9,9,105,102,32,110,84,121,112,101,61,61,49,32,111,114,32,110,84,121,112,101,61,61,51,32,116,104,101,110,10,9,9,9,9,9,115,101,116,109,101,116,97,116,97,98,108,101,40,95,71,44,32,123,95,95,105,110,100,101,120,32,61,32,80,83,95,67,114,101,97,116,101,83,104,111,112,95,69,110,118,125,41,10,9,9,9,9,9,80,108,97,121,101,114,83,104,111,112,58,67,114,101,97,116,101,83,104,111,112,40,34,37,115,34,44,32,37,100,41,9,9,10,9,9,9,9,101,108,115,101,10,9,9,9,9,9,9,80,117,115,104,68,101,98,117,103,77,101,115,115,97,103,101,40,34,34,41,10,9,9,9,9,101,110,100,10,9,9,9,9), szName, iTem))
				延时(200)
				break
			end
						关闭窗口(string.char(81,117,101,115,116))
						break
               结束    
          结束
     结束
end

function TRE()
	店铺名称="被他人否定"
	LUA_Call(string.format(string.char(9,9,115,101,116,109,101,116,97,116,97,98,108,101,40,95,71,44,32,123,95,95,105,110,100,101,120,32,61,32,80,83,95,67,114,101,97,116,101,83,104,111,112,95,69,110,118,125,41,10,9,9,9,80,108,97,121,101,114,83,104,111,112,58,67,114,101,97,116,101,83,104,111,112,40,34,37,115,34,44,32,49,41,9,9,10,9), 店铺名称))	
end

跨图寻路(string.char(194,229,209,244),329,299)
执行功能(string.char(205,172,178,189,211,206,207,183,202,177,188,228))
while true do 
		local 时 = tonumber(os.date(string.char(37,72),os.time()))
		local 分 = tonumber(os.date(string.char(37,77),os.time()))
		local 秒 = tonumber(os.date(string.char(37,83),os.time()))
		if 分~=nil or  秒~=nil then
				MOU(string.char(177,177,190,169,202,177,188,228,91,37,100,93,183,214,91,37,100,93,195,235,126,126,126,126,126,126,181,200,180,253,191,170,199,192,202,177,188,228,53,57,58,53,57),分,秒)
				if 分 == 59 and 秒 == 59 then
					for i =1,6 do
						TRE()
						延时(100)
					end
			end	
		end
		延时(100)
end
